about_the_game:
◆Featured Systems

◇Full CG mode can be turned on in the environment setting, and HCG can be freely browsed.
◇Pressure-Free Operation Support one-click mouse operation-Fast text-to-text system

◆Story

Feng was a perfect woman with a beautiful figure, good character and good education.
She never complained about taking care of her sick brother and was always so gentle and soft ......

It was thought the two of them would go on like this for a long time.
But one night, when feng was away from home for work, she received an unsigned mail from his computer, which made all of this a radical change ......

◆Play Method

‘’My sister would get on a stranger’s car at a fixed point in time......''
Try to find out the truth and save your sister within 100 days. Depending on the level of the triggered events, you can enter different endings.
Enjoy the time of living with your beautiful sister, Feng, and being carefully taken care of.
The game has a large number of costumes, so you can enjoy different costumes of your sister, and each costume has a corresponding H event.

◆Game features

◇24 sets of basic CG, including more than 150 differences.
◇The game text is about 60,000 words.
◇There are elements of NTR.
◇Game ending: 3 kinds.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, Non-Consensual Sex, Explicit Sexual Acts . All characters are over 20 years old.

name: My Sister's Secret

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: ‘'My sister would get on a stranger’s car at a fixed point in time......'' The younger brother Yantai, who was frail and sickly, was under the thoughtful care of his sister Feng. The life of the two seemed to be beautiful and plain but the sisters seemed to be hiding some secrets ......
supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese, English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Thai, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Korean
*languages with full audio support
